./.auto-claude/specs/007-uygulaman-n-gen.description: Created comprehensive implementation plan with 5 phases and 27 subtasks for Workflow/Flow System. Phases: 1) Core Flow Infrastructure (Strapi schemas), 2) Flow Execution Engine (node handlers, SDK integration), 3) Frontend Flow Builder (React components), 4) Scheduling and Webhooks, 5) Integration and Polish.

backend/src/api/flow/content-types/flow/.description: Created Flow content type in Strapi with fields: name (string, unique), slug (uid), description (text), nodes (json), status (enum: draft/active/paused/archived), inputSchema (json), outputSchema (json), isActive (boolean), version (string), category (enum), metadata (json). Also created controller, routes, and service files following existing patterns.

backend/src/components/flow/.description: Created three flow node components for Strapi: input-node.json (defines flow inputs with inputFields, validationRules), agent-node.json (links to agent with promptTemplate, skills override, model override, retry settings), output-node.json (defines output delivery with type, format, file saving, webhook support). All follow existing Strapi component patterns with collectionName format 'components_flow_*_nodes'.

backend/src/api/flow-execution/content-t.description: Created FlowExecution content type for tracking flow execution history. Key fields: flow relation, status enum, input/output JSON, logs array, error fields, timing (startedAt, completedAt, executionTime), nodeExecutions array, triggeredBy enum, retry tracking. Service includes lifecycle methods: startExecution, addLog, updateNodeExecution, completeExecution, failExecution, cancelExecution, getFlowStats.

src/api/flow/.description: Flow API implementation with enhanced controller (12 custom methods: findBySlug, findActive, toggleActive, updateStatus, duplicate, validate, findDetails, findByCategory, findRecent, activate, deactivate, archive), custom routes file exposing 12 REST endpoints, and service with helper methods (duplicateFlow, generateSlug, getFlowSummaries, bumpVersion, search, getExecutableFlows, exportFlow, importFlow). Follows existing patterns from agent and skill APIs.

src/api/flow-execution/.description: FlowExecution API with comprehensive controller (17 methods for CRUD, lifecycle, and monitoring), custom routes (17 REST endpoints), and service (18 methods for execution lifecycle, statistics, and utilities). Key endpoints: POST /flow-executions/start, POST /:id/complete, POST /:id/fail, POST /:id/cancel, POST /:id/retry, GET /stats, GET /running, DELETE /cleanup. Service includes retry support, cleanup old executions, execution timeline, and execution summary features.

src/types/flow-types.ts.description: Created comprehensive TypeScript types for the Flow Execution Engine. Includes: Flow (workflow definition), FlowNode types (InputNode, AgentNode, OutputNode with discriminated union), FlowExecution (execution tracking), FlowExecutionContext (runtime context), NodeExecution (individual node state), FlowExecutionResult (final results), SSE update types for real-time streaming, and utility types/type guards. Types align with Strapi schemas in backend/src/api/flow/ and backend/src/components/flow/.

src/services/flow-execution-service.ts.description: Created FlowExecutionService - main flow runner that orchestrates node execution, manages state, and handles errors. Uses EventEmitter for SSE updates, supports node handler registration for extensibility, implements retry logic for agent nodes, and integrates with Strapi for execution persistence. Singleton pattern with flowExecutionService export.

src/services/flow-sdk-service.ts.description: FlowSdkService is the singleton wrapper around ClaudeSdkService for flow execution. It handles: MCP config path setup, working directory configuration, event-based result collection, and timeout handling. AgentNodeHandler uses this service to execute agents within flows via the executeAgent() method.

src/routes/flow.routes.ts.description: Flow REST API with SSE streaming for real-time execution updates. Endpoints: POST /api/flows/:id/execute (SSE), GET /api/flows/executions/:id/stream (SSE monitoring), GET/POST /api/flows/executions/:id (status/cancel). Uses FlowSSEStream helper class and integrates with flowExecutionService events.

src/services/strapi-client.ts.description: Enhanced Strapi client with comprehensive flow-related methods. Includes properly typed Flow CRUD (getAllFlows, getFlow, getFlowBySlug, getActiveFlows, getFlowsByCategory, getFlowsByStatus, createFlow, updateFlow, deleteFlow, duplicateFlow), FlowExecution CRUD (getAllFlowExecutions, getFlowExecution, createFlowExecution, updateFlowExecution, deleteFlowExecution, getFlowExecutionsByFlowId, getRunningFlowExecutions, getRecentFlowExecutions, getFlowExecutionsByStatus), and statistics/maintenance methods (getFlowStats, getGlobalFlowStats, cleanupOldFlowExecutions). All methods use proper types from flow-types.ts.

src/web/manager/types.ts.description: Added frontend flow types to types.ts: Flow, FlowNode (InputNode/AgentNode/OutputNode union), FlowExecution, NodeExecution, FlowExecutionUpdate for SSE, FlowStats, GlobalFlowStats. Also added 'Flows' to ManagerView enum. Frontend types use string for dates (vs backend Date objects). Type guards isInputNode/isAgentNode/isOutputNode available for discriminated union narrowing.

src/web/manager/services/flow-api.ts.description: Created Flow API Service for frontend that provides comprehensive API client functions for flow operations including CRUD, status management, flow execution with SSE streaming, and execution monitoring. Follows existing patterns from api.ts and chat-api.ts.

src/web/manager/components/FlowsPage.tsx.description: Created FlowsPage component for flow management. Features: grid view of flows with status/category badges, filter by status (all/active/draft/paused/archived) and category, search by name/description/slug, actions (Execute with SSE, Edit, Activate/Deactivate, Duplicate, Delete), recent executions display, auto-refresh (30s). Uses flow-api.ts for data, follows SkillsPage patterns. 540 lines.

src/web/manager/components/FlowEditorPag.description: Created FlowEditorPage.tsx (1100+ lines) - a comprehensive flow editor with linear node configuration. Features: flow metadata form (name/slug/description/category/status/version), collapsible node sections (Input -> Agent(s) -> Output), input field management, agent/skills selection from available entities, prompt template with {{input}} interpolation, output type/format configuration, file/webhook settings. Integrates with flow-api.ts for CRUD and api.ts for loading agents/skills. Uses Card, Button, Input, Select, Textarea from ui components.

src/web/manager/components/flow/.description: Created flow node configuration components directory. Contains: InputNodeConfig.tsx (input field configuration with 11 field types), AgentNodeConfig.tsx (agent selection, prompt template, skills, execution settings), OutputNodeConfig.tsx (output type, format, file/webhook settings), and index.ts barrel export. These are reusable form components for configuring flow nodes in the FlowEditorPage editor.

src/web/manager/components/FlowExecution.description: Created FlowExecutionModal - a comprehensive modal for running flows with dynamic input forms and real-time SSE execution status. Features: split-panel layout (input form | execution log), supports 11 input field types with validation, SSE streaming for real-time updates, color-coded message display, execution result output. Integrated into FlowsPage.tsx via selectedFlowForExecution state. Pattern follows AgentExecutionModal and TaskExecutionModal for modal structure and SSE handling.

src/web/manager/components/layout/Sideba.description: Sidebar navigation menu uses a data-driven approach with menuItems array. Each item has: view (ManagerView enum), label (display text), and icon (Lucide icon component). Adding a new section requires: 1) Add to menuItems array, 2) Import icon from ui/Icons, 3) Ensure ManagerView enum has the value. The view handler (onNavigate) is passed from ManagerApp.tsx which handles routing logic in renderDashboardContent().

backend/src/components/flow/schedule.jso.description: Created flow/schedule.json Strapi component for automated flow execution scheduling. Supports three schedule types: 'once' (single execution at specific time), 'cron' (cron expression-based recurring), 'interval' (fixed interval recurring). Includes timezone support, start/end date validity windows, run count limits, default input values, and retry configuration on failure. Flow schema updated with 'schedule' component field plus 'webhookEnabled' and 'webhookSecret' for webhook triggers.

src/services/flow-scheduler-service.ts.description: Created FlowSchedulerService - a simple setInterval-based scheduler for personal use. Checks flows every minute, supports 'once', 'cron', and 'interval' schedule types. Includes basic cron parsing for common patterns. Integrated with flowExecutionService for running flows. Singleton exported as flowSchedulerService. Initialized via flow-init.ts at server startup.

src/routes/webhook.routes.ts.description: Created webhook routes for triggering flows via HTTP. Endpoints: POST /api/webhooks/flows/:identifier (trigger), GET /api/webhooks/flows/:identifier/info (config info), POST /api/webhooks/flows/:identifier/test (test without execution), GET /api/webhooks/flows (list webhook-enabled flows). Supports X-Webhook-Secret or Bearer token auth. Sync mode (waitForCompletion) and async mode with timeout configuration. Registered in server.ts at /api/webhooks path.

src/web/manager/components/flow/FlowSche.description: Created FlowScheduleConfig component for flow scheduling UI. Supports three schedule types (once, cron, interval), timezone selection, date ranges, retry settings, and default input values. Uses toggle switches for enabled states and provides cron presets for common patterns. Exports createDefaultSchedule() utility function for initializing schedule state.

src/web/manager/components/FlowDetailPag.description: Created FlowDetailPage component with tabs for Overview (flow info, nodes, schedule/triggers) and Execution History (paginated list with expandable rows showing logs, node executions, input/output, and error details). Uses ExecutionRow subcomponent with collapsible details. Navigation handled via ManagerApp.tsx with viewingFlowId state. FlowsPage updated with View button and clickable titles.

src/services/flow-templates.ts.description: Flow templates service provides 8 pre-built flow templates (Web Scraper, Data Processor, API Integration, Content Writer, Document Analyzer, Code Assistant, Email Responder, File Processor). Each template includes complete flow data with Input/Agent/Output nodes. Functions: getAllTemplates, getTemplateById, getTemplatesByCategory, searchTemplates, createFlowFromTemplate (regenerates node IDs for uniqueness). REST endpoints available at /api/flows/templates/* (routes must be defined before :id routes to avoid conflicts).

src/services/flow-error-handler.ts.description: Created flow-error-handler.ts with comprehensive error handling utilities: classifyError() for categorizing errors as transient/permanent/unknown, calculateRetryDelay() for exponential backoff with jitter, createRetryState()/recordRetryAttempt()/markWaitingForRetry() for retry state management, shouldRetry() and determineRecoveryAction() for retry decision logic, and formatDelay()/formatErrorSummary() utilities. DEFAULT_RETRY_CONFIG provides sensible defaults (3 retries, 1s initial delay, 30s max, 2x backoff with jitter).
